bwwExcerpt: You can't say John Guare's new play "A Free Man of Color" isn't ambitious in scope or awash in extravagant eye candy. Or that the huge cast of 33 isn't fully committed. But unfortunately that doesn't add up to a satisfying evening.

keyPhrases.quote: But unfortunately that doesn't add up to a satisfying evening.
